class.name: PLATEAUTerrain
class.brief_description: Converts terrain meshes to heightmaps and smoothed meshes.

method.name: generate_from_mesh
method.description: Generate a heightmap from a single [PLATEAUMeshData]. Returns a [PLATEAUHeightMapData] containing the generated heightmap. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS).

method.name: generate_from_meshes
method.description: Generate a heightmap from an array of [PLATEAUMeshData]. All meshes are merged before heightmap generation. Returns a [PLATEAUHeightMapData] containing the generated heightmap. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS).

members.member: Width of the generated heightmap texture in pixels.
Height of the generated heightmap texture in pixels.
Whether to fill edge pixels that may be missing data.
Whether to apply a blur filter to smooth the heightmap.
